import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update a room"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v2.0/locations/rooms/{roomId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates an existing room's properties such as name, capacity, type, or status. Use this to keep room metadata aligned with real-world changes.

**Prerequisites**
1. **roomId** - Use [POST /api/v2.0/locations/rooms/query](/docs/api/locations/query-location-rooms) and extract `Items[].LocationRoomId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Load current room details: [GET /api/v2.0/locations/rooms/\{roomId\}](/docs/api/locations/get-location-room-by-id).
2. Modify fields in `UpdateLocationRoomRequest`.
3. Save changes: [POST /api/v2.0/locations/rooms/\{roomId\}](/docs/api/locations/update-location-room).

**Minimal Required Fields**: roomId (path) plus at least one field to update.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"roomId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"The unique identifier of the room to update"},{"name":"Authorization","in":"header","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string"},"description":"Bearer token for authentication"},{"name":"SiteId","in":"header","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Site context for the request"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Request model for creating or updating a location room. Extends LocationRoom with additional update options.","properties":{"LocationRoomId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Unique identifier for the room. Required for updates, null for creates."},"SiteId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Site/district this room belongs to"},"LocationId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Parent location (building/school) containing this room"},"Name":{"type":"string","description":"Room name or number (e.g., 'Room 101', 'Main Office')"},"Number":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Room number identifier"},"LocationRoomTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Reference to the room type classification"},"LocationRoomStatusTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Reference to the room's current status"},"Area":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"description":"Room area in square feet"},"SeatingCapacity":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"description":"Number of seats available in the room"},"MaximumOccupancy":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"description":"Maximum number of people allowed in the room"},"PrimaryPhotoId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","nullable":true,"description":"Reference to the primary photo file for this room"},"Description":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Detailed description of the room"},"InternalNotes":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Internal notes about the room (not visible to end users)"},"IsAvailable":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the room is available for internal reservations"},"IsExternallyAvailable":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether the room is available for external/community reservations"},"LeadTimeThreshold":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"description":"Minimum lead time required before reserving this room"},"LeadTimeThresholdUnit":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"Unit for lead time threshold","enum":["Hours","Days","Weeks"]},"IsDuplicateRequest":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates if this is a duplicate/clone request","default":false},"UpdateCustomFields":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether to update custom field values","default":false},"CustomFieldValues":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"object","description":"Custom field value assigned to a location room. Extends the base CustomFieldValue with a room reference.","properties":{"LocationRoomId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Reference to the room this custom field value belongs to"},"CustomFieldTypeId":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"Reference to the custom field type definition"},"EditorTypeId":{"type":"integer","nullable":true,"description":"Editor type identifier for rendering the field"},"Value":{"type":"string","nullable":true,"description":"The custom field value (for simple field types)"},"IsHidden":{"type":"boolean","description":"Whether this field value is hidden from display"},"ComplexValue":{"type":"array","nullable":true,"items":{"type":"object","description":"Complex editor value structure for multi-value or structured custom field editors.","properties":{"Key":{"type":"string","description":"Key identifier for the complex value entry."},"Value":{"type":"string","description":"Value associated with the key."},"DisplayValue":{"type":"string","description":"Human-readable display value."}},"additionalProperties":true,"title":"ComplexEditorValues"},"description":"Complex/multi-value field data (for advanced field types)"}},"required":["LocationRoomId","CustomFieldTypeId"],"title":"LocationRoomCustomFieldValue"},"description":"Custom field values to set on the room"}},"title":"UpdateLocationRoomRequest"},"example":{"Name":"Room 101 - Updated","Description":"Updated classroom description","SeatingCapacity":35}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
